thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Terrible hotel
thread.title_full: Terrible hotel - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Mercedes, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: 575MarkT
title: Terrible hotel
text:
Where do I start, a very dark and dingy overpriced hotel in Paris. Hotel is dated with dark decor. No facilities, not even a bar. It is situated on a very busy road junction and every room faces the street, so constant traffic noise. Plumbing is even noisier. Beds are like sleeping on concrete and under my bed was dirty washing and all sorts of other stuff. It clearly had not been cleaned properly for months. All in all , one of the worst hotels I have ever stayed in. Do not stay here.
Room Tip: Avoid, there is not a good room. See more room tips
